value.title: Dascena Presents Poster Highlighting Machine Learning Algorithm for Earlier Detection of ACS at HFSA Virtual Annual Scientific Meeting
value.excerpt: Dascena, Inc., a machine learning diagnostic algorithm company that is targeting early disease intervention to improve patient care outcomes, today announced that a poster highlighting the ability of a Dascena machine learning algorithm to provide earlier identification of acute coronary syndrome (ACS) is being presented during the Heart Failure Society of American (HFSA) Virtual Annual Scientific Meeting 2020.
